When in game, change control settings to default.

I did it this way, and everything is seems to work like a charm.
If u are using SKIDROW's release u will have already installed crack .dll files in game folder. That's what i did :
1.   Overwrite these files over fresh installed game into \Alice Madness Returns\Alice2\Binaries\Win32 folder
2.   In same folder, u will find file SKIDROW.dll. Delete it, or cut it to somewhere, or just rename it. I renamed, i think it doesnt matter
3.   Then go to folder \Alice Madness Returns\Game\Alice2\Binaries\Win32  There will be 2 files - SKIDROW.dll and AWC.dll  Delete them both.
4. Start the game from shotcut on the Desktop

It worked like a charm for me, no crashes (for few hours i spent playing), no umbella problem.
Happy jizzing over this good game ;)

@Douche88  you probably copied the awc.dll file to the wrong folder.  Skidrow had you copy it to one folder, and Theta's crackfix has you copy it to a different one.  Make sure you're putting the files in the right folders.

@tawaren
I tried what you said, it doesn't seem to for me.  So I tried reinstalling the game, here's what I did:

1. I installed the game with skidrow's torrent (after deleting everything). 
2. I copy/paste the three files from theta's crack (AliceMadnessReturns, awc.dll, awc.org) to \Alice Madness Returns\Alice2\Binaries\Win32 folder.  I ask to copy and replace.
3. I try to launch game but it fails, I get this ''AWC.ddll load failed.'' error.

*4. After that I tried deleting the ''AWC.dll '' file to see if it changed something and now it starts but Ea is asking for my activation code.  I tried the three cd-keys given in the crack folder but none seems to work.

Anyone knows what I'm doing wrong?? I've been trying all day to make this work, I'm totally out of ideas.  :(

Thank you in advance.

Weird, now the memories won't work, neither will any of the cinematics... what's going on here? Can anyone else confirm a similar precedence please? Go and try to access memories, see if they work, and report back here.

Never mind! It was me, I fucked with the AliceEngine.ini and it resulted in that. So just for future reference, if you can't access memories, then delete that file and it will re-manifest and you can then edit it properly.

If you want to skip movies, do NOT enable the bForceNoMovies. Instead put a semi colon in front of each movie you want to skip (in my case all of them), like so...

[FullScreenMovie]
bForceNoMovies=FALSE
;StartupMovies=LoadingMovie.bik
;LoopingStartupMovies=LoadingMovie.bik
; Startup movies order: legal spiel=> EA logo => licensors(?) => Spicy logo => looping until title screen comes up
;StartupMovies=Intro_EA.bik
;StartupMovies=Intro_SH.bik
;StartupMovies=TechLogo_Short.bik
;PCStartupMovies=Intro_Nvidia.bik
LoopingStartupMovies=LoadingMovie.bik
;+SkippableMovies=Intro_Nvidia.bik
AlwaysLoadedMovies=LoadingMovie
LoadMapMovies=LoadingMovie
bShouldStopMovieAtEndOfLoadMap=True
DelayCountAfterMapLoaded=60
ForceFadingInDuration=0.0
LoadingTextX=570.0
LoadingTextY=120.0
SkipEALogoTime=6.0

If you enable bforcenomovies, it will disable all ingame cinematics and memories. Basically, my guess is that it disables all Bink materials.

If you're getting the AWC.dll load fail error then you need to run CCleaner and it's Registry cleaner.  After that delete the Save folders(you can backup to desktop and repaste later) from "Documents".  After this attempt to start the game and everything should work fine.  This worked.

This crack works:
1.  Download the CLONE DVD version
2.  Install it.
3.  Copy the Alice 1 and Alice 2 folders over to your install directory from the CloneDVD source directory.   For some reason the Alice install ends way too soon and doesn't copy all the files. This leads to the "failed to find default engine.ini" error trying to run it.  I checked my install size on the installed folder and had only 85 MB used. After manually copying the Aliice 1 and 2 folders I now have the correct 9.186 GB in 4202 files.
4.  Copy the crack folders to the appropriate Alice 1 and Alice 2 installed game directories allowing file replacements on all files.
5.  Play the game and enjoy.

I'm running on Windows 7 Pro 64-bit with 8GB ram, an Intel Core i5 660 cranked up to 4 GHz, and an ATI 5770 1 GB PCIe video at 1920 x 1080 resolution.  The game runs great (even with 2x AA on), no sound stutter or lag on my Gigabyte P55-UDR3 built in sound, and Logitech wireless keyboard/mouse.   The program does have a few flaws and will crash sometimes but overall I can play for hours between crashes so I'm happy enough.

Hi guys.. for those players who had a hard time pressing 2 keys @ a time (FOCUS + UMBRELLA) go to "Configuration" in pause menu then go to "Camera" tab you can see the "Focus on target" option change it to "toggle" cause on my opinion UMBRELLA only activates on FOCUS MODE which is so goddamn annoying.. so instead of holding 2 keys @ the same time try to make ur "FOCUS ON TARGET" to toggle mode instead of holding it.. :) Hope this helps.. godbless.. :D

For those people who can't get alice to stomp when giant:
1. Go into the AliceGame Config folder (C: >Program Files (x86) > EA Games > Alice Madness Returns > Alice2 > AliceGame > Config)
2. Open 'DefaultInput'
3. Copy 'GiantStomp ' (inc. single space) into a key binding ( I tested with the binding 'Y')
The finished sentance should read: 
.Bindings=(Name="Y",Command="GiantStomp ")
4. Save and run the game 

Hope this helps some people :)

When I try to execute the application (i.e. double-click), the loading cursor appears for a couple of seconds then goes away and nothing happens! What did I do wrong?

IMPORTANT NOTES:

1. Delete ALL of skidrow's files (AliceMadnessReturns.exe, Skidrow.dll, awc.dll)

2. Copy ALL of the files in the theta crack folder. The AliceMadnessReturns.exe, awc.dll, awc.org to Alice2\Binaries\Win32, AND DONT FORGET the files from the CORE FOLDER. Copy those files (awc.all, awc.org) to Alice2\Binaries\Win32\Core.

3. The Crack works fine 100%, if it doesnt, blame your shitty dumb brain.
